title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 577 - Special Provisions Relating to Wild, Scenic and Recreational Rivers
content:

State Regulations
§ 577.1 - Applicability of this part
§ 577.2 - Definitions used in this Part
§ 577.3 - Boundaries of river areas; amendments of river area boundaries; distance measurements within river areas
§ 577.4 - General rules
§ 577.5 - Rivers projects
§ 577.6 - Restrictions and standards in river areas
§ 577.7 - Existing uses
§ 577.8 - Standards for the review of rivers projects

§ 577.10 - Variances from the provisions of this Part

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 577

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 15-2709, 24- 0805, 24-0903[5]; Executive Law, §§ 804[9], 809[14]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
